question: Which of the following was the main reason for the annexation of Satara and Nagpur by the Doctrine of Lapse?
option1: Ruler of both state had no adopted son
option2: Both states had huge potential of natural resources
option3: Position of both state was significant
answer: Position of both state was significant
explanation: According to Hindu law, adoption was legal. Ruler of both Satara and Nagpur had an adopted child but the British did not accept them as the legal heir as the position of the states was significant. Satara and Nagpur were situated on the way of Bombay to Madras and Madras to Kolkata respectively. That was the main reason for the annexation.
